statements: DELETE FROM email_engagement_data WHERE email_id = 'abc123' AND user_id = 456;
DELETE FROM email_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 789 AND click_timestamp IS NULL;
DELETE FROM email_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 100 AND open_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM click_data WHERE email_id = 1 AND clicked_link = 'example.com';
DELETE FROM email_engagement WHERE id = 3 OR (open_status = TRUE AND click_status = FALSE);
DELETE FROM click_through_rates WHERE email_id = 100 AND click_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM engagement_data WHERE interaction_type='click' AND interaction_count > 5;
DELETE FROM open_rates WHERE open_time < '2022-01-01' AND email_id = 123;
